com.brightcove.mobile.android
Interface BCPlayerControls.MediaPlayerControl

All Known Implementing Classes:
BCPlayerView
Enclosing class:
BCPlayerControls
public static interface BCPlayerControls.MediaPlayerControl

Represents contract between player controls and BCPlayerView. This interface defines all data that is passed between the controls and the player.
